bib.title: Diagnostic tools in plWordNet development process
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej and Burdka, {\L}ukasz and Maziarz, Marek and Kali{\'n}ski, Micha{\l}
bib.abstract: wordnet editing, as well as wordnet evaluation, our goal is to develop a system supporting  editor team in avoiding errors during wordnet editing and completed with an automated diagnostic  method for a wordnet,  of tools that identify and signal potential faults in the wordnet. The
